name: Online Course
description: A course description is a summary of what students will learn from following an online course. A good course description comes in a few variant lengths, to use in different channels it is published.

name: Remote Learning
description: Remote Learning occurs when the learner and instructor, or source of information, are separated by distance and cannot meet in a traditional classroom setting.

name: Private Tutor
description: Private tutor is a specialist trained in helping students comprehend and assimilate the concepts and details of any given subject.      Private tutors work with students on one-on-one basis probably at home or any other place chosen for the purpose of teaching and learning.

name: Consulting
description: Consultants offer advice and expertise to organisations to help them improve their business performance in terms of operations, profitability, management, structure and strategy.

name: Lectures
description: Lecturers are subject experts who design, develop, and deliver material using a range of methods and platforms. They create course material, lesson plans, and curricula, conduct research and fieldwork, engage with students, assist with processing applications.

name: Lessons-for-Kids
description: You will not be happy “when” something happens any more than you can choose to be happy now.  Goals and dreams are important, but being thankful for the every day is what makes daily life rewarding.  Gratitude grounds us in what is truly important.
